mapper.insert: insert into board (btitle, bcontent, bwriter) values(#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter})
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwritedt, bcount, bwriter from board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent}, bupdatedt = #{bupdatedt} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwritedt, bcount, bwriter form board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, bwritedt desc
